products.name: c2
products.long_description: 2" gel-infused comfort layer is a great balance of comfort and proactive support.
products.meta_description: Learn more about the adjustability and comfort that the c2 360 Smart Bed offers to give you a blissful night's sleep.
products.disclaimer: Furniture sold separately. Prices higher in AK and HI
products.upsell_text: Standard base sold separately. Options available in shopping cart.

features.name: Dual Adjustability
features.text: Adjustable comfort and firmness on each side—your Sleep Number<sup>®</sup> setting

features.name: Responsive Air<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Responds to your movements and automatically adjusts firmness on each side

features.name: SleepIQ<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Shows sleep quality—your SleepIQ<sup>®</sup> score—with personal insights for better sleep

features.name: Contouring sleep surface
features.text: Stretches and conforms to gently support you

financing.name: 48 Month Financing on c2 Mattress
financing.disclaimer_message:
No Interest For 48 Months*

On purchases with a Sleep Number® credit card through 11/05/2022. 48 equal monthly payments required.
financing.legal_disclaimer_message: *Qualifying purchase amount must be on one receipt. No interest will be charged and equal monthly payments are required on promo purchase until it is paid in full. These payments equal the total promo purchase amount divided by the number of months in the promo period and rounded up to the next whole dollar. These payments may be higher than the payments that would be required if this purchase was a non-promo purchase. Any monthly payments shown in connection with this promotional offer exclude taxes and delivery and should allow you to pay off the promotional purchase within the promo period if (1) you make your payments by the due date each month and (2) this is the only balance on your account during the promo period. If you have other balances on your account, this monthly payment will be added to the minimum payment applicable to those balances. Regular account terms apply to non-promo purchases. For new accounts: Purchase APR is 29.99%. Minimum interest charge is $2. Existing cardholders: See your credit card agreement terms. Subject to credit approval.

categories.name: Bedding & Pillows
categories.description: Shop your exclusive bedding solutions that will keep you sleeping comfortably.
categories.meta_description: Shop online for Sleep Number products

data.html: Sale Page Top Content
Sale Page Bottom Content

products.name: ComfortFit™ Pillow
products.description: Everyone’s new favorite pillow is a wonder-filled combination of soft comfort and conforming support.
products.long_description:
Conforming Support and Soft Comfort

Experience a pillow that gently conforms to your head and neck. Unique fill blend of premium down alternative fibers and memory foam recovers its shape night after night. Cover features a Lyocell blend for superior softness and breathability. Hypoallergenic for allergen-sensitive sleepers.

Available in three shapes designed to fit the way you sleep.

Classic: Gently supports your head and neck. Best for stomach or back sleepers.

Curved: Fits your contours for enhanced comfort and support. Best for side or back sleepers.

Ultimate: Three removable inserts let you individualize your support and height as your sleep needs change. Great for all sleeping positions. Recommend 1-2 inserts for stomach sleepers; 2-3 inserts for back or side sleepers.

Product care instructions: Spot Clean Only - Curved and Classic
Ultimate – Remove cover and machine wash cover only

Made in the USA of imported materials.

5-Year Limited Warranty
products.meta_description: Experience the conforming support of memory foam with the soft comfort of down alternative fiber—all in one pillow. Memory foam pieces blended with premium down alternative fiber offer a unique fill that won’t lose its shape.  Luxurious lyocell blend cover provides the ultimate in breathability.

data.html:
Conforming comfort and soft support for any sleeper. Unique blend of memory foam pieces and premium down alternative fibers. Gently conforms to your head and neck and recovers its shape night after night. Breathable Lyocell blend cover is luxurious and soothing. Hypoallergenic for allergy sensitive sleepers.

Find the pillow that's just right for you. Take our PillowFit® quiz.

Available in three shapes designed to fit the way you sleep.

  • Classic: Gently supports your head and neck. Best for stomach or back sleepers.
  • Curved: Fits your contours for enhanced comfort and support. Best for side or back sleepers
  • Ultimate: Three removable inserts let you individualize your support and height as your sleep needs change. Great for all sleeping positions. Recommend 1-2 inserts for stomach sleepers; 2-3 inserts for back or side sleepers.

Curved and Classic shape: Spot Clean Only 

Ultimate shape: Remove cover and machine wash the cover only.

Made in the USA of imported materials.

Learn more about how to care for your pillows.

products.name: In Balance™ Pillows
products.long_description:
Adapts to Your Ideal Temperature

Stay comfortable and dry with our temperature balancing pillow featuring Outlast® technology with Climadry® fiberfill and supportive foam. It adapts to you, absorbing excess heat and releasing it as you cool. 100% cotton sateen, 300-thread-count cover helps keep fill from shifting. Hypoallergenic, so it offers a naturally effective barrier against dust mites and other common allergens.

Available in three shapes designed to fit the way you sleep.

Classic: Gently supports your head and neck. Best for stomach or back sleepers. **THIS STYLE DOESN’T CONTAIN FOAM ONLY FIBERFILL

Contour: Fits your contours for enhanced comfort and support. Best for side or back sleepers.

Ultimate: Three removable inserts let you individualize your support and height (from a 4”, 5” or 6” contour) as your sleep needs change. Great for all sleeping positions.

Product care instructions: Classic: Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low heat. Repeat cycle as needed until fill is completely dry. Remove promptly.
Contour & Ultimate: Remove cover and wash in warm water with mild detergent; tumble dry on low. Foam insert: Spot clean foam insert with mild detergent and warm water; air dry at room temperature away from direct sunlight and heat.

Made in the USA of imported materials.

5-Year Limited Warranty
products.meta_description: Outlast® temperature balancing material continually regulates and adjusts to your body’s changing temperature.

products.name: VariaCool™Pillow
products.meta_description: Sleep Number's Variacool Pillow guarantees a restful night with supportive, gel-infused memory foam and cooling technology.

products.name: PlushComfort™ Pillows
products.long_description:
Looking for plush comfort and support?

Silky-soft and hypoallergenic, our down alternative pillow’s microfiber fill mimics the softness of premium down, combined with a smooth, brushed cotton cover for plush comfort and support.

Available in three shapes designed to fit the way you sleep.

Classic: Gently supports your head and neck. Best for stomach or back sleepers.

Curved: Fits your contours for enhanced comfort and support. Best for side or back sleepers.

Ultimate: Three removable inserts let you individualize your support and height as your sleep needs change. Great for all sleeping positions. Recommend 1-2 inserts for stomach sleepers; 2-3 inserts for back or side sleepers.

Remove promptly from dryer.

Product care instructions: Removable cover is machine washable. Fluff or shake as needed to maintain even distribution of fill. Machine wash warm with mild detergent in commercial-size front-loading washing machine. Tumble dry low for minimum 2–3 cycles to ensure filling is completely dry.
Ultimate: Remove cover prior to washing

Made in the USA; cover imported from China.

5-Year Limited Warranty
products.meta_description: Shop for Sleep Numbers PlushComfort Pillows. Designed with microfiber and equipped with hypoallergenic materials, PlushComfort is the perfect combination of comfort and support.

products.name: DownComfort™ Pillow
products.long_description:
Luxurious down. Extraordinary comfort.

Extraordinarily soft and lofty, our down pillows feature long-lasting, natural 650-fill-power American down paired with a 500-thread-count cover for luxurious comfort and superior performance.

Available in three shapes designed to fit the way you sleep.

Classic: Gently supports your head and neck. Best for stomach or back sleepers.

Curved: Fits your contours for enhanced comfort and support. Best for side or back sleepers.

Ultimate: Three removable inserts let you individualize your support and height as your sleep needs change. Great for all sleeping positions. Recommend 1-2 inserts for stomach sleepers; 2-3 inserts for back or side sleepers.

Product care instructions: Refluff or shake as needed to maintain even distribution of fill. Machine wash warm on delicate cycle with mild detergent in commercial-size front-loading washing machine. Tumble dry low for minimum 2–3 cycles to ensure filling is completely dry. Remove promptly from dryer.
Ultimate: Remove cover prior to washing.

Cover made in China; filled in USA.

5-Year Limited Warranty

products.merchant_message: Three ways to create your perfect pillow

data.html:
Whether you love the softness of down or the pressure relieving support of foam, comfort is what you make it. Here’s a way to choose precisely what you want in your ideal pillow.

Note: You’ll need to place your outer comfort shell and inner support core into your shopping cart individually.

5-year limited warranty for peace of mind.

First, choose the comfort shell fill you prefer.

Down: If you love soft, luxurious comfort

Down Alternative: An affordable, soft, hypoallergenic fill

Memory Fiber: A medium fill that conforms like memory foam with the adjustability of fiber

Dual Support: Foam on one side and down alternative on the other lets you choose medium-to-firm comfort

Next, choose the inner support that’s just right for you.

Down: If you love soft, luxurious comfort

Down Alternative: An affordable, soft, hypoallergenic fill

Memory Fiber: A medium fill that conforms like memory foam with the adjustability of fiber

Foam Contour: If you like a medium-to firm fill with pressure-relieving support

From the temperature balancing benefits of In Balance™ to the allergen protection of cotton, we’ve got your pillow covered.

LEARN MORE

products.name: Lyocell Ultra Sheet Set
products.meta_description: Find the Sleep Number 's highest quality Lyocell Ultra Sheets Sets, developed with durable fibers to ensure comfortable and long lasting pillowcases.

data.html:
Soft, breathable lyocell blend offers conforming comfort all night long. Now with ExactFit sheet design for a flexible fit that moves with you. 300-thread-count sateen weave for luxurious softness. Fits any mattress up to 15 inches.

Designed and crafted in the USA.

Our Lyocell Ultra sheets are proudly designed at Sleep Number headquarters in Minneapolis, MN. Made from imported materials, they’re then cut and sewn in the USA by a family-owned company with more than 30 years of expertise.

Includes

Sheet set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Split King contains two Twin Extra-Long fitted sheets. 

Learn more. See our How-to videos.

Find the ideal bedding combination. Mix and match colors using Bedding Planner.

Fitted sheet: 68% lyocell, 27% cotton, 5% elastane

Flat sheet and pillowcases: 70% lyocell, 30% cotton

Made in the USA of fabric imported from China.

Machine wash gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry.

Do not pour detergent directly on sheets and avoid chlorine bleach or detergents with added bleach or whiteners.

Do not use fabric softener, overload washing machine, or wash with non-bedding items. These increase friction, which can break down fabrics or cause pilling.

Drying
Remove from dryer while slightly damp to prevent wrinkles. Do not use dryer sheets, as they may weaken and break down the yarns.

Storage
Store sheets in a cool, dry, well-ventilated area. Do not store in plastic containers as this may cause fabric to discolor.

FYI
Certain hair and skincare products may discolor sheets and pillowcases or cause pilling.
STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® certification keeps you and your family safe from harmful substances. Label ID and test institute: 18.HUS.47931 HOHENSTEIN HTTI

products.name: Total Protection Mattress Pad
products.description: Get a 10-year limited warranty to protect your mattress from almost any stain.
products.long_description:
Waterproof, stain-resistant, and offers a 10-year limited warranty on your Sleep Number® bed.

Helps move heat away so you stay cooler. Now featuring Nano-Cool Knit fabric that moves heat rapidly away from your body for a cooler, more comfortable sleep surface. When you buy our Total Protection mattress pad at the same time as your new SLEEP NUMBER® bed, you'll receive a 10-year limited warranty to guarantee your mattress is protected from almost any stain life can throw at it. The ultimate in mattress protection is waterproof, stain resistant and hypoallergenic. Fits mattresses up to 16 inches. Logic™ Label takes the guesswork out of where to start making your bed.

Twin: 38 x 75   Twin Extra-Long: 38 x 80      Full: 54 x 75
Queen: 60 x 80       Eastern King: 76 x 80   California King: 72 x 84  
California Twin XL: 36 x 84  FlexTop® King: 76 x 80 FlexTop® California King: 72 x 84
